website_summaries.verdict: The best on the market right now. Well worth the extra cost in terms of reliability and performance.
pros: Stands out for its rapid heat-up and even drying thanks to heated vertical and horizontal bars
cons: Quite an investment, but you are paying for quality
Some find installation to be tricky

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, quality product
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this towel warmer for our bathroom remodel to remind me of home where we have radiators and getting out of the shower to a nice warm towel was always such a nice feeling. Towel warmer did not disappoint, looks great on the wall and heats up well. My husband took it to a whole new level for me and added a timer so we can preset it and have it come on a couple of hours before I get up for work to ensure my towel us nice a toasty by the time I need it. :) high quality piece for not that much money. Easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Beth S

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but make a template before drilling holes
customer_reviews.text: This is working great, nice and hot. Not too hot to touch, but too hot to hold onto. Mechanically it is well designed and easy to put together. My one suggestion is to do what I did not do, and make up a paper or cardboard template with the holes to be drilled, and tape it to the wall before marking and drilling to get everything spot-on. There is very little tolerance for having drilled holes just a little bit off, and correcting any mistakes will involve filling and painting holes and starting over. Would be nice for the manufacturer to include a flimsy thin paper drilling template -- it would cost them pennies and save a lot of headache.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Nice heater
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, altough have only had the rack for 2 weeks. I had a handyman install it along with a timer outlet and so far it has worked very well. It looks very nice on my wall and matches the chrome bathroom fixtures I bought. It does stick our from the wall a bit so be careful where you place it. The space between the poles it narrower than it looks in the picture and when I have my towel folder like in the picture it is a very tight fit, I have had to separate the 2 sides. Overall I like the device very much.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, though it doesn't warm towels as much as ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, though it doesn't warm towels as much as I had expected (and wanted). I think it's only drawing 1.25 Amps, so that explains why it's not very hot. The install was pretty easy. If you are handy and have done some basic wiring, getting this model (which requires a wall box installed for the wiring) instead of a plug-in version is MUCH better. Wasn't too had to do. I installed it with a little timer switch which costs a few extra bucks but is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: The viewer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and a great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at a great price. I could not be happier and would give it 10 stars if that was an option. I ordered this and installed it myself. Installation is pretty straightforward; you have to get the four mounting posts and cover plate correctly positioned which is key and you have to set up the switch circuit and wiring. I finished installation and turned it on today for the first time. Wow! This heats up quick, gets hot and really cooks your towel. Fantastic feeling wrapping yourself in a hot towel after showering.
customer_reviews.author: PJM

customer_reviews.title: reliable product and excellent costumer service
customer_reviews.text: I have had the Amba towel warmer for about 4 years and it worked flawlessly every day until the switch went bad. I looked on the company’s website to buy a new one and could not find the part. Sent them an e-mail explaining the problem and within a couple of hours got a response saying a new one had been sent to me free of charge. First class costumer service! The towel warmer is sturdy, looks nice and priced much lower than similar products. Would certainly buy again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Empis

customer_reviews.title: Good rack. Poorly located off/on switch!
customer_reviews.text: If you are going to purchase this item...and the rack itself is fine...be sure to hardware a wall switch for it as well. The switch on the unit is located on the bottom of the left vertical bar. It is hard to locate and hard to operate. It lights up when on, but that is hard to see in a lit room or in daylight.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: saw them in Germany and loved the fact that towels were warm when needed and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a towel warmer for years, saw them in Germany and loved the fact that towels were warm when needed and dried after use. The ones in Germany were a part of the house heating system...IE they functioned as bathroom radiator primarily. What a genius idea. When I came back, I started looking to add one to my bathroom. I have not yet installed this (just arrived last week and waiting on my installer) but expect it to be a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Having trouble, but can’t find a way to get help
customer_reviews.text: I’m so upset. We have drilled holes in our new marble wall and hung the warmer. It comes on but does not heat up! Now what?
customer_reviews.author: Virgets

customer_reviews.title: I like this warmer
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured and it gets warm after a few minutes. I use this in my basement bathroom since the bathroom isn't as warm in the basement. Who wants to step out of the shower when it's chilly.
customer_reviews.author: RBJ

customer_reviews.title: Good bye to regular towel racks
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is a luxury to have in your bathroom but you don't know what you're missing till you have one. Very handsome chrome looking bars that provide extreme heat. I was rather surprise how quickly the unit hits up. We have it set on a timer and our towels are warm and toasty on cold winter mornings. The warm feels super nice. So glad we bought it through Amazon which provided fast and efficient delivery. Perfect size for 4-5 towels but hanging two towels then to spread the heat evenly vs. too many towels. Great unit and looks really good in our bathroom. Amazon rocks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Looks great and gets warm very fast. Only negative the the metal junction box cover has a black plastic o ring to seal it, but it’s needed to keep out moisture. Plan on buying again when we redo the second bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this thing. Gotta have 2 ppl to install. Update: I did quite a bit of research on these things and a lot ppl said they don't last and/or weren't hot enough. I've had it for almost 2 years and still working. My wife loves it
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome towel rack
customer_reviews.text: Great towel warmer. I had an electrician install this but I guess a handy person might be able to install it. It looks great and really works to keep the towel fresh and dry. No stinky wet towels for me.
customer_reviews.author: DoesItSuck

customer_reviews.title: Takes well over 30 minutes to get warm and towels are luke warm at best
customer_reviews.text: It does look nice. I had in professionally installed and was told it was easy to set up. Turn on button is at the bottom and easy to see as it lights up too. Very disappointed that it really takes so long to get warm and my towel is not hot at all. ;(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This ended up mostly as a very expensive towel rack. It looks very nice, but the expense involved in installing an outlet just in the right place on the bathroom wall and the mediocre towel heat doesn't make this worth it.
customer_reviews.author: lorie maak

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. We use it as a bathroom heater too (small bathroom). It does take a while to warm up so plan ahead and it actually gets very hot, you could get burn if you were to keep your hand on it more than a split second. Works great with the GE push button timer.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I really love our heated towel rack. Living in Florida you still get out of a hot shower and feel chilled..Wrapping yourself in a toasty towel feels like heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Let it snow with my new towel heater
customer_reviews.text: Love my towel heater. It’s pretty and warm enough for towels yet not hot enough to burn. I had the electrician place the heater high over my toilet with the amazon recommended timer. Love it
customer_reviews.author: S. Arias

customer_reviews.title: If you’re not an electrician and carpenter, it might not be for you
customer_reviews.text: This thing is not an easy install if you walls are in place. I wish I had done a better job researching this thing before I got stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: From MS to Mac

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this towel warmer. Having warm towels is a first world luxury but man it’s nice! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Installed and working great. I had no issues putting it in or ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed and working great. I had no issues putting it in or it working. Gets very warm to the touch, be careful where you install it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Weitzel

customer_reviews.title: Purchased the towel warmer and installed it along with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the towel warmer and installed it along with a TPLink switch. Now Alexa can turn on my towel warmer from anywhere in the house. Still trying to figure out how to hang the towel to get optimal warming. The towels could be a bit warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Katee Crandell

customer_reviews.title: sturdy. Only trouble that I ran into was the ...
customer_reviews.text: rack itself looks high quality, sturdy. Only trouble that I ran into was the plastic anchor brackets. I had 2 of the 4 split apart while trying to screw them into drywall. You will need to start with about 1/4 inch pilot hole, so that the anchor brackets will still hold without breaking while installing. This isn't mentioned in the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: It HEATS UP Real Well
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived promptly, in good condition, and as specified. This item heats up marvelously hot. Not too hot to sustain burns but way hot enough to warm up towels.
customer_reviews.author: Markus F. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: superb
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for the space. The right size and the curved bar is so much better than my other towel heater with straight bars. You don't have to struggle with the towel fitting.
customer_reviews.author: ILikeStuff

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well, although it would be nice if there ...
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well, although it would be nice if there was more space between bars. Also hard to figure out turn on and to wire up to timer. Almost sent it back because could not get it to turn on. Finally figured out that even though on timer, the button on bottom must be turned on. Instructions could be more comprehensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Best decision we ever made. There is nothing better than the nice, warm towel. Towels get warm and feel fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: katarzynaq hajduk

customer_reviews.title: Inferior chrome plating.
customer_reviews.text: The mounting hardware has inferior chrome plating. The chrome plated bolts are showing rust even before you open its packaging. If this is a sign of the long term performance of the unit, I would move on to something of higher value. Just to be sure, I ordered a second and planned to return the first one. No surprise, they were the same. I gave it two stars because I assume it actually works if installed and the chrome on the rack looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Until you've used heated towels
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Until you've used heated towels, you have no idea how good they feel. Supplements the baseboard heat in our bathroom quite nicely as well. Provide blocking and it's easy to install. Gets quite hot to touch but warms towels nicely. My family is thrilled with this, saying the shower experience in our new bath is luxurious as a result. Added cost in electricity I feel is insignificant. Turn it on 10-15min. before your shower and they'll be nice and toasty. Replace them after a shower and they'll dry quickly. You can even warm up your pj's or clothes on it. NICE!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and sturdy. Gets very hot. Reccomend placing on a timer to avoid excessive electricity use
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and works well.
customer_reviews.text: This installed for a clean look and functions very well. We used a timer switch with it. Nice hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: This is a fire hazard if left on.
customer_reviews.text: This towel warmer literally put burn marks across my bath towels as a result of it having been left on. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: june

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Love the towel warmer. Wish it was a little hotter but works as expected and was fairly simple to put in.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's great, but seems to get a little too hot. You could burn your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect towel warmer!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered towel bars for my new house...Works better than I thought. Reviews said the towel had to be touching the bars to be warm, which is true, but the towel are very toasty warm. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda B.

customer_reviews.title: Another fan of this towel heater
customer_reviews.text: Flip the switch before you disrobe for a shower and unit heats up fast enough that your towel is ready to envelop you in warmth within 10 min. Just gotta remember to turn off...
customer_reviews.author: sara rothert

customer_reviews.title: Takes awhile to heat up
customer_reviews.text: There's only one thing I wish and I wish I had known to buy a towel warmer with more wattage because while this towel warmer works, it takes a bit of time for the towel to get toasty warm for my liking. It has to be on for at least a 1/2 hour or more for the warmth to penetrate the cloth, but I make sure that I turn it on ahead of time so I have a warm towel after every shower. Other than that that small detail, I am just thrilled I installed this during my bathroom renovation.
customer_reviews.author: Shop-a-holic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and using the warm towels coming of shower
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Company
customer_reviews.text: The Amba has been installed for a week now and it is great! Looks cool; solid. Pretty easy to install but you will probably need to have someone with good electrical background help you. Read the parts list carefully...I made the mistake of thinking I was missing parts when the "missing" parts were actually assembled into another part. I notified the company that I thought parts were missing and they were very responsive, even with the winter storm that was shutting things down back east. They sent me new parts when they probably new that I had them already. Impressive.
customer_reviews.author: David Steinfeld

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought in conjuction with the Honeywell RPLS730B100/U 7-day programmable timer and had it professionally installed.
customer_reviews.author: Rut Ayala

customer_reviews.title: solid product
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product. Solid feel. Chrome is a little more polished nickel. works well
customer_reviews.author: Carlson Family

customer_reviews.title: Toasty towels
customer_reviews.text: Warm towels are really nice when stepping out of the shower. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: SMG

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect addition since we did away with all towel racks
customer_reviews.text: Just redid our master bath, very Zen. This is a perfect addition since we did away with all towel racks, except small hand towel ones by the sink. I did try and turn it on, heats very fast and hot. A programmable thermostat would be helpful since the on-off is on one of the bars.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Heating up our towels well. Electrician added a switch ...
customer_reviews.text: Heating up our towels well. Electrician added a switch so it doesn't run constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice, Had to send it back due to the size, too large for my space. I bought this because I wanted hard wired. I ended up buying a plug in style and it is designed to have the plug cut off and then be wired direct into a power source without the large plug cover. See my other reviews in a couple weeks for a full review of the unit I ended up buying.
customer_reviews.author: Sharpe Family

customer_reviews.title: Mine came with zero mounting hardware. Zilch. Just ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with zero mounting hardware. Zilch. Just a pigtail and some captive nuts on the back side. Now I have to build a whole thing just to mount it. WTF?
customer_reviews.author: Aaron K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: This warmer looks great but could get a little warmer For the money it's a great value I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Solid and looks good Never got to test it.
customer_reviews.text: It looked nice, felt like it was quality built and like it would warm towels properly. Unfortunately I never got to install it for my Fiance. I bought it for Christmas and she didn't' want it. I would purchase this again in the future if she would allow it.
customer_reviews.author: MJTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: there is available a timer switch that is programable for ease of use but unnecessary for our irratic schedule
customer_reviews.text: works well, has on/off switch to be able to use at will rather than on all the time, as our previous one was. there is available a timer switch that is programable for ease of use but unnecessary for our irratic schedule. .Well connected to wall. A very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Solution finder

customer_reviews.title: Be Decadent and have hot towels !!
customer_reviews.text: Product looks good and works well. The mounting is really firm as well as the whole thing looking good. I have installed it so that I have a timer controlling so that I can save energy. I have it to come on at 7 am for an hour and I think that I will be able to reduce this time. The rail and towel heats up quickly. I love the hot towel for drying myself it is so decadent
customer_reviews.author: Old Morris Man

customer_reviews.title: One towel
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Ideal for one towel. I wish I would have initially purchased the larger one for holding 2 towels.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It woks very well. I have keep on only few hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: JKoski

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, except for where the ON/OFF switch is located: under the device, on the left side. Hard to reach.
customer_reviews.author: BookieMonster

customer_reviews.title: Item Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a large renovation project. The item was described as "Used, Very good". The packaging it came in was badly wrapped and a corner was ripped out. Contrary to description of "Used, Like New" there were no installation instructions included. I finally found instructions on-line from Amba. Once installed the product did not work. I love the way it looks, but for the money I spent, I need something that actually warms the towels, not just hangs them.
customer_reviews.author: DougS51

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Returned it as I had no idea it required an electrician.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

product_meta.title: Amba RWH-CP Radiant Hardwired Curved Towel Warmer, Polished
feature_bullets: Made of 18/8 stainless steel. Width is 23.62 inch, Height is 31.87 inch and Depth is 5.75 inch
Ten crossbars allow optimal drying. Rust and Tarnish Resistant
Horizontal and vertical bars are heated.Power:150 watts. Minimal power consumption

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars99 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
